overview:
Ben Vu is the CEO & Co-Founder of SkyVu Entertainment, a next-gen entertainment company that creates original mobile social games, mobile gaming technologies, and licensed consumer products. Vu was an animator on the Oscar nominated film CORALINE when he decided to break free to realize his own character franchises for the iPhone. His hit mobile game franchise, BATTLE BEARS, has been downloaded over 14 Million times and have reached the top of the App Store in the U.S., China, Australia, and over 40 other countries. SkyVu has garnered Top Games of the Year awards from Yahoo/Appolicious, TouchArcade, and iLounge.

Vu recently graduated from Gallup’s Entrepreneurial Acceleration System and was awarded the Midwest Business Journalâ€™s 40 Under 40 award. Vu received his B.A. from Ball State University, and earned his M.F.A. from CalArts.
